climbs.name: Red Faced Lizard
climbs.fa: Dave Thompson, Clay Frisbie, Cole Fennel

content.location: Furthest right climb on the obvious slab/boulder right of Lord of the flies.

content.description: Climb a few large chunks of boulder on the left side of the slab eventually pulling onto it.
content.location: Left most route on the slab face of the Crankenstein Boulder

content.description:
Great slab climbing in an area that doesn't have too many slabs.  Climb the well protected lower slab to the ledge where the climbing becomes much easier. Good thing, because its a long way to that first bolt and there's no pro to be found. 

  At the first bolt, the angle tips more vertical.  Climb past the first bolt, then another to the top out.
content.protection: A few tiny to finger sized cams, 2 bolts.  Anchor/rap on the tree slightly left of the line.
content.location: This is the light colored south facing slab above three very large boulders downhill.

content.description: Stem the dihedral between Flat Fields and Ebony and Ivory Direct to the obvious ledge. Hand traverse the ledge to the right, past the first bolt, to the right tending bolt line. Delicate moves on small holds keep the line sustained with a few larger holds for rests interspersed.
content.protection: Stick clip the first bolt. 5 bolts, bolt anchor
content.location: Technical face climb to the right of Ebony and Ivory, left of Grandmaster Flash 12b.

content.description: Climb the chimney or do the harder bolted direct start to obtain the ledge.  From here, thin face climbing right on the border between a black and a white streak leads to a traverse left on a sloper to a nice pocket.  Now move up into the thin crack on even thinner feet.  Be careful, as a fall in this section may lead to hitting the ledge below.  Clip the third bolt from a jug and top out to the left.
content.protection: 3-4 bolts, depending on variation.  Anchor/rap from tree just left of the topout.
content.location: Just right of the chimney that is right of Flat Fields.

content.description: This area contains the routes on and around the giant obvious slab just past the Brick Attack area, but before the Stems and Seeds area.  If you are following the standard trail, you cannot miss it.
